name: Point Defense Hell
description:
(Full-screen recommended! Refresh browser to restart (restarting in game was broken, sorry. ^^))

Bullet-hell x Tower Defense! 

Tired of all those bullets flying at your face? Why not build some turrets to shoot them down, slow them, or even shoot back at your enemies? Welcome to Point-Defense Hell.

Main features:

  • Build turrets between waves
  • Several enemy types
  • 20 levels
  • The tried and tested controls of the shoot em’ up genre

Turret types:

  • Point-defense turrets shoot down enemy bullets. Can be great for making the incoming barrage more manageable. Upgrading increases their fire rate.
  • Slow turrets slow down bullets within their area of influence (the circle.) Useful for dodging, and for slowing bullets for your point-defense turrets to take out. Upgrades increase the slow effect.
  • Anti-Enemy turrets attack your enemies directly. Helpful to grind down your enemies if you’re too busy dodging. Upgrading increases their fire rate.

Other tips:

  • Holding shift slows down your ship. Useful for fine-grained dodging.
  • Your hit-box is the little teal box on your ship. You only need to worry about it getting damaged.
  • Point-defense turrets can cause the game to lag when a lot of bullets are on screen. Definitely an issue, but I didn’t have time to optimize unfortunately.
